name: Poison Ivy
description: The user releases a toxic cloud of spores that can poison or paralyze the enemy.
battleEffect: May poison or paralyze the target.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
battleEffect: Poisons the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Sludge
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
battleEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Sludge Bomb
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
battleEffect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

bonuses.name: Poison Touch
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance of Poisoning the Target on Contact

bonuses.name: Toxic Boost
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost per Turn After Being Poisoned

name: Toxic Shield
description: The user creates a toxic gas shield that reduces damage taken and has a chance to poison attackers.

bonuses.name: Toxic Shield
bonuses.bonus: Reduces damage taken and has a chance to poison attackers.

name: Electroweb
description: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokemon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets' Speed stat.

bonuses.name: Galvanize
bonuses.bonus: +20% Damage per Level

bonuses.name: Surge Surfer
bonuses.bonus: Double Speed Boost in Electric Terrain

name: Raging Storm
description: The opponent is caught in a raging storm, where they are trapped, unable to move properly and unable to switch Pokémon. Random rays fall from the sky and can hit the enemy, causing paralysis. The attack's effect lasts for a set duration, and each thunderbolt has a chance to hit every X seconds.
battleEffect: Traps the opponent in a raging storm, unable to move or switch Pokémon. Random rays fall from the sky, causing paralysis. The effect lasts for a set duration, and each thunderbolt has a chance to hit every X seconds.

bonuses.name: Storm Surge
bonuses.bonus: +10% Duration Increase per Level

name: Thunder Storm
description: The user unleashes a powerful thunderstorm that strikes all opponents. This move has a high critical_hit ratio.
battleEffect: Strikes all opponents. High critical_hit ratio.

bonuses.name: Stormchaser
bonuses.bonus: 5% Critical_Hit Ratio Increase per Level

name: Fly
description: The user flies up into the sky and then dives at a steep angle to strike the target.

bonuses.name: Tailwind
bonuses.bonus: +10 Speed per Level

name: Gust
description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

name: Whirlwind
description: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: Tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slashes fiercely at the target. It may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause the opponent to flinch.

bonuses.name: Scope Lens
bonuses.bonus: 20% Critical Hit Ratio Boost

name: Dust Devils
description: The user creates a small whirlwind of dust and debris that surrounds them, increasing their dodge chance by x%.

bonuses.name: Dust Devils
bonuses.bonus: Increases user's dodge chance by x%

name: Airborne Dodge
description: The user quickly flies up into the sky, dodging the opponent's attack. The chance of dodging is increased if the user is on the Fly or has the Fly ability selected.

bonuses.name: Aerial Ace
bonuses.bonus: 20% Boost to Dodging Attacks while on Fly or with Fly ability selected

name: Dragon's Gale
description: The user vigorously flaps its wings, creating a devastating shockwave that hits all enemy pokemons with massive special damage.
battleEffect: Hits all enemy pokemons with a fierce gale of wind and energy.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws. It may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause the opponent to flinch.

bonuses.name: Razor Claw
bonuses.bonus: 20% Critical Hit Ratio Boost

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
battleEffect: May cause paralysis.

bonuses.name: Dragon Claw
bonuses.bonus: 10% Damage Boost

bonuses.name: Dragon Fang
bonuses.bonus: 20% Chance to Flinch the Target

name: Fatal Protection
description: The user takes a defensive stance that blocks all incoming damage. However, this harshly lowers the user's defense and sp. defense.

bonuses.name: Risky Block
bonuses.bonus: Blocks all incoming damage but harshly lowers the user's defense and sp. defense.

name: Risk_Block
description: The user takes a high_risk, high_reward defensive stance. There is a chance to block all damage received, but if successful, the user's defense and sp. defense are harshly lowered.

bonuses.name: Risk_Block
bonuses.bonus: Has a chance to block all damage received and raise the user's Defense and Special Defense.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
battleEffect: Blasts the foe with a huge volume of light. May also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Rockslide Quake
description: The user causes a massive rockslide, causing damage to all opponents and lowering their accuracy.
battleEffect: Lowers opponents' accuracy.

bonuses.name: Rock Solid
bonuses.bonus: +5% Damage Increase per Level

name: Sinkholes
description: The user creates multiple sinkholes on the battlefield, causing massive area damage to all enemy Pokemon.

name: Eruption
description: The user triggers a massive eruption from the ground, causing devastating Fire and Ground damage to all opponents and the user.
battleEffect: Causes massive Fire and Ground damage to all opponents and the user.

bonuses.name: Flaming Earth
bonuses.bonus: +10% Damage Increase per Level

name: Cataclysm
description: The user unleashes a devastating nature effect that hits all Pokemon in the arena, including the user. The second type of the move varies based on the weather conditions.
battleEffect: Unleashes a devastating nature effect that hits all Pokemon in the arena, including the user.

bonuses.name: Nature's Fury
bonuses.bonus: +10% Damage Increase per Level

name: Aurora Borealis
description: The Pokémon creates an intense light with the cold air, drastically decreasing the opponent's Special Attack.
battleEffect: The user creates an intense light with the cold air, drastically decreasing the opponent's Special Attack.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: The user invokes a gigantic aura that covers the moon, absorbing its energy. The aura then descends with all its strength falling on the enemies. This attack leaves the user asleep after use.
battleEffect: The user invokes a gigantic aura that covers the moon, absorbing its energy. The aura then descends with all its strength falling on the enemies.

name: Solar Eclipse
description: The Pokemon invokes a gigantic aura that covers the sun, absorbing its energy, and then descends with all its strength to hit the enemies. This move deals damage to all opponents in the arena and has a chance to burn them. This attack leaves the user asleep after use.
battleEffect: The Pokemon invokes a gigantic aura that covers the sun, absorbing its energy, and then descends with all its strength to hit the enemies.

bonuses.name: Solar Energy
bonuses.bonus: 20% chance to Burn the Opponent

name: Gravity Waves
description: Ripples in the fabric of spacetime that propagate outward from a massive object, such as a black hole or a pair of merging neutron stars. This attack causes confusion and hits all Pokémon in the arena.
battleEffect: Creates ripples in the fabric of spacetime, causing confusion and hitting all Pokémon in the arena.

name: Glaciers
description: The user summons masses of ice that form over many years in areas where snowfall exceeds melting ice and hurls them at opponents.
battleEffect: The user summons masses of ice that form over many years in areas where snowfall exceeds melting ice and hurls them at opponents.

bonuses.name: Frozen Solid
bonuses.bonus: Has a 20% chance to freeze the target.

bonuses.name: Hailstorm
bonuses.bonus: Power doubles during a hailstorm.

name: Confusion
description: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also confuse the target.
battleEffect: An attack that may cause confusion.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.
battleEffect: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.
battleEffect: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

bonuses.name: Honey Gather
bonuses.bonus: 10% chance of Honey

bonuses.name: Sticky Hold
bonuses.bonus: 50% chance of Sticky Barb

name: String Shot
description: The opposing Pokemon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
battleEffect: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. This reduces the target's accuracy.
battleEffect: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. This reduces the target's accuracy.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
battleEffect: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Struggle Bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
battleEffect: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: Twineedle
description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
battleEffect: The user jabs the target with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Sting
description: The user stabs the target with a toxic barb, potentially poisoning it.
battleEffect: A sharp jolt of poison_tipped barbs are shot at the target. It may also poison the target.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
battleEffect: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
battleEffect: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.
battleEffect: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Fury Cutter
description: A slashing attack that grows in power with each consecutive hit.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
battleEffect: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.
battleEffect: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

name: Pursuit
description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.
battleEffect: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
battleEffect: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

name: Bite
description: The user bites with cold_infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
battleEffect: May cause flinching.

description: This Pokémon assumes a defensive stance, increasing its Defense by x%.

description: This passive move gives the Pokémon a x% chance of curing any change of status at the end of each turn.

bonuses.name: Cleanse Aura

description: Enables moves to hit Ghost_type foes.

name: Technician
description: Boosts the power of moves that have a power of 60 or less.

name: Cut
description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

bonuses.name: Cut
bonuses.bonus: Can also be used to cut down thin trees

name: Fly
description: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.

bonuses.name: Fly
bonuses.bonus: User is immune to Ground_type moves on first turn

description: The user's flying type moves are more accurate, increasing their accuracy by 20%.

bonuses.name: Keen Eye
bonuses.bonus: Increases accuracy of all moves by 10%.

bonuses.name: Tangled Feet
bonuses.bonus: Increases evasion by 10% when confused.

name: Aerial Mastery
description: The Pokémon has mastered the art of aerial combat, increasing the accuracy and power of Flying_type moves.

bonuses.name: Aerial Ace

bonuses.name: Acrobatics
bonuses.bonus: Increases the base power of Acrobatics by 20% if the user is not holding an item

bonuses.name: Sky Attack

name: Surf
description: The user attacks everything around it with a giant wave. This can also be used for crossing water.

bonuses.name: Surf
bonuses.bonus: Can also be used to cross bodies of water

name: Feather Shield
description: A passive move that increases the defense of Flying_type Pokemon.

bonuses.name: Roost
bonuses.bonus: When a Flying_type Pokemon uses Roost, its defense and special defense are restored to maximum.

bonuses.name: Pressure
bonuses.bonus: When a Flying_type Pokemon with Pressure is targeted by a move, the opposing Pokemon uses 2 PP instead of 1.

name: Defog
description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

bonuses.name: Gale Wings
bonuses.bonus: When user has full HP, flying_type moves have their priority increased by 1.

name: Strength
description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This move can also move boulders.

bonuses.name: Rock Smash
bonuses.bonus: _1 Enemy Defense

bonuses.name: Superpower
bonuses.bonus: _1 User Attack, _1 User Defense

name: Flash
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

name: Whirlpool
description: Traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

bonuses.name: Rain Dance
bonuses.bonus: +10% Accuracy

bonuses.name: Whirlpool
bonuses.bonus: +10% Damage

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

bonuses.name: Torrent
bonuses.bonus: When user has less than 1/3 HP, water_type moves deal 50% more damage.

bonuses.name: Rain Dance
bonuses.bonus: When used during rain, power of water_type moves is increased by 50%.

name: Rock Climb
description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

bonuses.name: Guts
bonuses.bonus: When user is inflicted with a status condition, physical moves deal 50% more damage.

bonuses.name: Sheer Force
bonuses.bonus: When user uses a move with a secondary effect, its base power is increased by 30%, but the secondary effect is removed.

name: Waterfall
description: The user charges the target at an overwhelming speed, crashing into it forcefully. This may also make the target flinch.

bonuses.name: Torrent
bonuses.bonus: When user has less than 1/3 HP, water_type moves deal 50% more damage.

bonuses.name: Rain Dance

name: Rock Smash
description: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

bonuses.name: Guts
bonuses.bonus: When user is inflicted with a status condition, physical moves deal 50% more damage.

bonuses.name: Steadfast
bonuses.bonus: When user flinches, its Speed is increased by one stage.

name: Aftermath
description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by 1/4 its max HP.

name: Dry Skin
description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

inBattleEffect.description: Prevents foes from fleeing or switching out if they are not immune to Ground_type moves.
inBattleEffect.shortDescription: Prevents foes from fleeing or switching out.

overworldEffect.description: Prevents encounters with wild Pokémon lower level than the user.

name: Battle Armor
description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
inBattleEffect: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Analytic
description: Boosts move power when the user moves last.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.

name: Drought
description: Summons intense sunlight that lasts for 5 turns upon entering the battle.
overworldEffect: In sunny weather, the power of Fire_type moves is increased by 50%.

name: Flame Body
description: Contact with the Pokemon may burn the opponent.

name: Flash Fire
description: Raises Fire_type moves by 50% when hit by a Fire_type move.

name: Blazing Aura
description: The user emits a blazing aura that increases the damage of Fire_type moves used by itself and its allies by 20%.

description: This passive move increases the physical damage of Fire_type moves by 20%.

name: Thermal Defense
description: The Pokémon's body is highly resistant to heat and fire attacks, reducing damage taken from these types of moves. It also increases the Pokémon's Special Defense stat.

bonuses.name: Flash Fire
bonuses.bonus: When hit by a Fire_type move, power of the user's own Fire_type moves is increased by 50%.

bonuses.name: Flame Body

name: Blaze
description: Powers up Fire_type moves in a pinch.

name: Compoundeyes

description: 30% chance of infatuating Pokémon of the opposite gender when using a move that requires making contact.

name: Damp
description: Prevents the use of self_destructing moves.
